channel.title: CVE Feed for checkpoint -- Check Point Quantum Gateway and Spark Gateway and CloudGuard Network
channel.description: The latest CVEs for checkpoint -- Check Point Quantum Gateway and Spark Gateway and CloudGuard Network

item.title: CVE-2024-24919|2024-05-28T18:59:43.905Z -- checkpoint -- Check Point Quantum Gateway and Spark Gateway and CloudGuard Network
item.description: Potentially allowing an attacker to read certain information on Check Point Security Gateways once connected to the internet and enabled with remote Access VPN or Mobile Access Software Blades. A Security fix that mitigates this vulnerability is available.
